principles: Mobile First: Every pixel must be touch-friendly (44px+ targets).
Data Density vs. Clarity: Use collapsible sections (accordions) to manage density on mobile.
Industrial Contrast: High contrast for readability in variable lighting conditions (shop floor vs office).
Speed: One-tap actions for common tasks (Quick Create).

instructions_to_main_agent: MOBILE FIRST: Always test layouts on 375px width. Use 'hidden md:block' for desktop-only elements.
TOUCH TARGETS: Ensure all clickable elements are at least 44x44px.
FORMS: Use 'inputmode' attributes (numeric, decimal, email) for better mobile keyboard experience.
DATA DISPLAY: On mobile, use 'Card Lists' instead of wide tables. Only use tables on desktop (md+).
NAVIGATION: Use a bottom navigation bar for mobile and a sidebar for desktop.
PDF GENERATION: Ensure generated PDFs are A4 size but the preview is responsive.
THEME: Default to Light Mode for better readability in bright industrial environments, but support Dark Mode.
TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects sparingly, mostly for overlays.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
